application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Conditions 6 (Contamination) of  planning permission ref. 73243/APP/2025/270  dated 01-05-2025 (Minor Material Amendment (S73) to vary Condition 2 (Accordance with Approved Plans) of planning permission ref. 73243/APP/2022/2535 , granted 11-11-2024 for: Erection of 6 dwellings with new access to Foxdell and erection of 3 dwellings with new access to Dene Road with associated landscaping and parking.
decision_conditions: The Applicant is advised that this application relates to details pursuant to the partial discharge only of Condition 6i (a -c) i.e. (Desk Study, Site Investigation and Method Statement) of the approved planning application 73243/APP/2025/270.
